proposal: Diving into ETH3.0, it's clear you're pioneering with an upgraded hard fork of Ethereum, enhancing the ERC-20 experience. With 223 holders on the ETH network, you're already making waves. Imagine amplifying this impact by integrating our DEX or launching a community-driven lottery. Let's bridge our tools with your vision, making every holder not just a participant but a creator. 🔄🎰
